dmca.title: DMCA Take Down Notice [ThePlanetAbuse-C4016976X]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2007 10:17 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA Take Down Notice [ThePlanetAbuse-C4016976X]

This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed important enough
for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for review and applicable action.

Abuse Department
The Planet


=====================
Original Message
=====================

2007 13:16:35 PDT

From: Why Markets Turn <admin@whymarketsturn.com>
Reply-To: admin@whymarketsturn.com
X-ASG-Orig-Subj: DMCA Take Down Notice
Subject: DMCA Take Down Notice
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@ev1servers.net
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
Message-ID: <452244.62191.qm@web81502.mail.mud.yahoo.com>
X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0
QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED 
Return-Path: admin@whymarketsturn.com
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 09 May 2007 20:16:50.0944 (UTC) FILETIME=[FA79F000:01C79276]

Date: May 09, 2007

Sender Information:
Dan Morikawa
WhyMarketsTurn.com
1415 S. Voss Road
Suite 110-320
Houston, TX 77057
281-685-4932

Recipient Information:
Everyones Internet
The Planet


Sent via: Email

Re: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down
Demand per 17 USC §512(c)(3)


Dear Sir or Madam:

This letter serves as my notification to you under the
Digital Millenium Copyright Act that your site is
infringing our copyrights as described below.

1. Identity of the copyrighted work that I believe has
been infringed upon.

I am the owner of WhyMarketsTurn.com which publishes a
software "Why Markets Turn", the website and the
trademark "Why Markets Turn" #77042344


2. Identity of the material that I claim is infringing
upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

http://www.ttradingsoftwareonline.com
Above website hosted on Name Server:
DNS1.HOST4DREAMS.COM
Reference:
http://whois.domaintools.com/tradingsoftwareonline.com




3. Information to contact me. 
Dan Morikawa
WhyMarketsTurn.com
1415 S. Voss Road
Suite 110-320
Houston, TX 77057
281-685-4932
http://wwww.whymarketsturn.com
admin@whymarketsturn.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the
copyrighted materials described above as allegedly
infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner,
its agent, or the law. 

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with
United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the
information in the notification is accurate and that I
am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

On behalf of WhyMarketsTurn.com, I hereby request that
you immediately disable and take down the infringing
materials. THIS IS A DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE.


I further request a list of other domains owned by
this person so I may invenstgate whether they infringe
in my copyrights.
Thank you in advance for your attention to this
matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you
take. 

Sincerely,

/s/
(Electronically signed)
Dan Morikawa
http://wwww.whymarketsturn.com
admin@whymarketsturn.com
